SELECT CASE month WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '一月') WHEN 2 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '二月') WHEN 3 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '三月') WHEN 4 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '四月') WHEN 5 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '五月') WHEN 6 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '六月') WHEN 7 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '七月') WHEN 8 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '八月') WHEN 9 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '九月') WHEN 10 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '十月') WHEN 11 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '十一月') WHEN 12 THEN CONVERT(varchar(10), '十二月') END AS capsMonth, COALESCE(COUNT(md.id), 0) AS total FROM ( SELECT 1 AS month UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 ) AS m LEFT JOIN master_data AS md ON m.month = MONTH(md.submit_time) AND YEAR(md.submit_time) = #{year} AND md.Item_type = #{itemType} and md.allocation_status = '1' GROUP BY m.month ORDER BY m.month;
